scripts.test-travis: npm run test-coveralls && npm run test-cli
scripts.test: npm run test-lib && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.prebundle: export THRESHOLD=8000000 && npm run build-languages && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc.js
scripts.bundle: export THRESHOLD=1000000 && npm run build-languages && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc-most.js
scripts.postbundle: export THRESHOLD=-1 && npm run build-languages && browserify lib/franc.js --standalone franc --outfile dist/franc-all.js
scripts.build-browser: npm run bundle && npm run mangle
scripts.build: npm run build-browser && export THRESHOLD=1000000 && npm run build-languages && npm run build-fixtures && npm run build-support
